name: Cave Snake
description:
In this game you will follow the quest of a brave caveman and an even braver snake in their quest to push the ctrl-alt-delete the virus that found it's way into the game. The helpful snake helps the caveman to get over obstacles by acting as a platform. Have fun! 

This is my second game ever. There are approximately 2 million glitches.
